channel.title: Welcome! on Viel Losero's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on Viel Losero's Website

item.title: About
item.description: Viel Losero is a pseudonym. If you can find me maybe you can hire me. If u have some feedback or need help with some computer problems, feel free to contact me.

item.title: Starting With Hugo: Static site generator.
item.description: Why Hugo I chose hugo after comparing the top static site gen and reading a couple of posts by jekyll vs hugo, everyone will have their preferences. This is the first SSG I use since for some I had to start, Hugo’s documentation is quite broad and easy to understand. Hugo installation Installing Hugo will depend on the operating system we have. In Devian it is as easy as using apt.
